title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
Introducing the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette! This professional makeup painting kit is suitable for both kids and adults, making it perfect for Halloween, FX, parties, and artistic endeavors. 

Inside the plastic case, you will find a palette with 20 vibrant colors in both flash and Aqua types. The specific colors available include gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white. 

The UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette is characterized by its non-toxic, oil-based formula that is gentle on the skin. It is easy to blend, comfortable to wear, and quick-drying. Once applied, it is smudge-proof, durable, and minimal rub-off. 

When the occasion is over, you can easily remove the paint with olive oil or a professional waterproof makeup remover. 

With this palette, you can create a variety of artistic and special effects looks, such as crowns, costumes, bruises, blood effects, and even cosplay. It is perfect for festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, stage performances, and of course, Halloween! 

Order the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette now and unleash your creativity!

**Product Name:** UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette

**Type:** Face Body Paint

**Palette:** The palette consists of 20 colors with a creamy and intensive texture, providing color saturation. The colors available in the palette include bossy gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white.

**Case:** The palette comes in a sturdy and convenient plastic case.

**Application:** The face body paint can be applied using a sponge or brush.

**Formulation:** The face body paint is oil-based, ensuring high quality. It is easy to blend, comfortable to wear, and provides vibrant colors. The paint is flexible, crack-resistant, and quick-drying. It is smudge-proof, durable, and has minimal rub-off. The product is also non-toxic and gentle on the skin. The coverage is color-saturated. To remove the paint, it can be easily washed off with olive oil or professional waterproof makeup remover.

**Suitability:** The face body paint is suitable for creating artistic makeup and special effects coloring. It is perfect for various occasions such as festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfire parties, theme parties, SFX makeup, stage performances, and Halloween. The paint can be used to create different looks including a crown, costume, bruise, blood, and cosplay. The product is suitable for both kids and adults.
